title: Mr. November
description: Rhett Jensen.Handsome stranger.Hero lifeguard.... And nursing a broken heart.Libby Reed.Booklover.Honey haired beauty.... And harbouring a secret.When Rhett saves a woman from the sea, he never expects her to invade his every thought from that moment on.When Libby and Rhett are thrown together a second time, Libby can't deny that she's intoxicated by the gorgeous man who saved her life, but no matter how hard he tries, she still doesn't know how to trust.Rhett wants Libby to let him in.Libby wants to keep her past in the past.Can Libby look forward to a future with Rhett when all she's ever done is look back over her shoulder?
author: Nicole S. Goodin
